document.full_text: bartolo colon pitched eight scoreless innings and rookie hector noesi provided three more in extra innings as the yankees escaped with a 4-1 victory over the orioles
document.title: yankees 4, orioles 1: for yankees, start and finish make up for what's between
lines_and_colors: bartolo colon pitched eight scoreless innings and rookie hector noesi provided three more in extra innings as the yankees escaped with a 4-1 victory over the orioles
